debug.mtaLoaded: MTA {{ type }} loaded. The size is: {{ size }}.
debug.ui5YamlDoesNotExist: The ui5.yaml file does not exist in the project. Please create one.
debug.mtaSavedFailed: MTA saved failed with error {{- error }}

error.unableToLoadMTA: Unable to load mta.yaml configuration {{- mtaDir }}, error thrown {{- error }}.
error.updatingMTAExtensionFailed: Unable to add mta extension configuration to file: {{mtaExtFilePath}}.
error.cannotFindBinary: Cannot find the "{{bin}}" executable. Please add it to the path or use "npm i -g {{- pkg}}" to install it.
error.mtaExtensionFailed: Unable to create or update the mta extension file for Api Hub Enterprise destination configuration: {{error}}.
error.missingMtaParameters: Missing required parameters, MTA path, MTA ID or router type is missing.
error.invalidMtaIdWithChars: The MTA ID can only contain letters, numbers, dashes, periods, underscores.
error.invalidMtaId: The MTA ID must start with a letter or underscore and be less than 128 characters long.
error.missingABAPServiceBindingDetails: Missing ABAP service details for direct service binding.
error.mtaFolderAlreadyExists: A folder with same name already exists in the target directory.
error.mtaAlreadyExists: An mta.yaml already exists in the target directory.
error.cannotUpdateRouterXSApp: Unable to update router xs-app.json welcome location.
error.doesNotContainACapApp: Target folder does not contain a Node.js CAP project.

info.existingMTAExtensionNotFound: Cannot find a valid existing mta extension file, a new one will be created.
info.existingDestinationNotFound: A destination service resource cannot be found in the mta.yaml. An mta extension destination instance cannot be added.
info.mtaExtensionCreated: Created file: {{mtaExtFile}} to extend mta module {{appMtaId}} with destination configuration.
info.mtaExtensionUpdated: Updated file: {{mtaExtFile}} with module destination configuration.
